counting_iterator.h File Reference

Defines the interface to an iterator which adapts an incrementable type to return the current value of the incrementable upon operator*(). Based on Boost's counting_iterator class. More...

#include <komrade/detail/config.h>

Detailed Description

Defines the interface to an iterator which adapts an incrementable type to return the current value of the incrementable upon operator*(). Based on Boost's counting_iterator class.
